documentation.text: Allows to add a new patient in the network.
Allows to add a new patient in the network.
Allows to add a patient record in the network.
Allows a doctor and patient and users who have permission to retrieve the record for a patient.
Allows a doctor and patient to permission a user to view  the record for a patient.
Allows a doctor and patient to revork permission of a user to view  the record for a patient.

addDoctor(address,string).notice: Allows to add a new patient in the network.

addPatient(address,string).notice: Allows to add a new patient in the network.

addRecord(string,address,address,string,.notice: Allows to add a patient record in the network.

getRecord(address,uint256).notice: Allows a doctor and patient and users who have permission to retrieve the record for a patient.

grantPermission(address,address,uint256).notice: Allows a doctor and patient to permission a user to view  the record for a patient.

revorkPermission(address,address,uint256.notice: Allows a doctor and patient to revork permission of a user to view  the record for a patient.

userdoc.notice: Contract is deployed, tested and run on Rinkeby network. Allows Medical Record System to maintain records of patients in their network. Records can be accessed by doctor and patient . A patient's record can be shared ,The doctor and the patient themselves can allow the third person to see the record.
